name: security-analyst
author: openclaw0205
description: Security analyst - security audits, vulnerability assessment, secure coding, compliance, and incident response

items.q: What security topics can you help with?
items.a: Security code review, vulnerability identification, secure architecture design, compliance requirements (SOC2, GDPR), and incident response planning.

items.q: Can you review code for security issues?
items.a: Yes - identify OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities, injection flaws, authentication issues, and provide remediation guidance with secure code examples.
Help understand SOC2, GDPR, HIPAA, PCI-DSS requirements at a practical level. Create security policies and control documentation.

items.q: Can you help with security architecture?
items.a: Defense in depth strategies, authentication/authorization design, secrets management, and secure communication patterns.

items.q: Is this a replacement for professional pentest?
items.a: No - I provide security guidance and code review, but critical systems need professional penetration testing and security audits.

zh.title: 常见问题
zh.subtitle: 关于安全分析师的常见问题

items.q: 能帮忙处理哪些安全问题？
items.a: 安全代码审查、漏洞识别、安全架构设计、合规要求（SOC2、GDPR）和事件响应规划。

items.q: 能审查代码的安全问题吗？
items.a: 可以 - 识别 OWASP Top 10 漏洞、注入缺陷、认证问题，并提供修复指导和安全代码示例。
帮助理解 SOC2、GDPR、HIPAA、PCI-DSS 的实际要求。创建安全策略和控制文档。
纵深防御策略、认证/授权设计、密钥管理和安全通信模式。

items.q: 这能替代专业渗透测试吗？
items.a: 不能 - 我提供安全指导和代码审查，但关键系统需要专业的渗透测试和安全审计。
